overview: YES. It’s a Movie.  It’s about a year in the life of the YES. Family.  DCP, Romain, JP, and Tadashi, slaying pow and adventuring.  We started in Chile last July, and have been shooting in Canada during December and January.  Next, DCP, Romain, JP, Tadashi, and Benji head to Japan with Pascal Gallant filming.  Helen Schettini, Mikey Pederson, and Jake Koia will hold it down in the Whistler Backcountry.
title: Yes. It's a Movie
